Text: Energy Reconciliation Letter Sent Good afternoon We are sending this email as a notification to you that we sent the attached letter via certified mail Please review the name and address for any errors and notify us of any necessry corrections If you have any questions please call the supplier hotline Thank you PECO Energy Electric Gas Choice

JanuaryApril Energy Reconciliation Calculation Error and Necessary CreditCharge adjustmentElectric and Gas Choice Communication Bulletin September STAKEHOLDER Suppliers Receiving this bulletin SUBJECT JanuaryApril Energy Reconciliation Calculation Error and Necessary CreditCharge adjustment PURPOSE of COMMUNICATION To inform Electric Generation Suppliers EGS of an error in the calculation of UnaccountedForEnergy UFE for the months January through April and necessary additional cash settlement between the EGS and PECO KEY FACTS Electric Gas Choice Group EGC has recently completed an extensive analysis of PJM Energy Reconciliation amounts for the periods of January April As a result of that analysis EGC has determined some modifications to monthly energy reconciliation amounts are required for those periods ACTION NEEDED If you are the recipient of this email our records show that you are impacted by these required modifications No EGS action is needed at this time You will be contacted shortly by an EGC representative to discuss these required changes to the monthly energy reconciliation amounts for the aforementioned period and any necessary creditcharge adjustments ANY QUESTIONS PLEASE CONTACT The Supplier Hotline
